website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable chair with a backless design that hides the exercise ball with a fabric covering.
pros: This chair looks better than most ball chairs thanks to its polyester covering
The backless design encourages you to sit up straight and allows for different sitting positions
Includes a 44 cm exercise ball and pump
cons: Some customers found the legs wobbly
No wheels means you cannot move around easily

customer_reviews.title: Bought Oct 1. Delivered Oct 4. Noticed this ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought Oct 1. Delivered Oct 4. Noticed this split today. I have sat on the ball a handful of times and the seam is splitting? I weigh 210 pounds and 5'11. As you see, the return date closed Nov 3 and I can't seem to find company contact info for Safco. Guess I'll deflate it and sew it myself. 155 dollars my ass!
customer_reviews.author: John C. Renken

customer_reviews.title: My hips and legs are saved!
customer_reviews.text: My hips and legs were stiff and sore from sitting on an office chair all day, and it was affecting ability to run not to mention my quality of life. Stability ball chairs were showing up in the office, and I found this unique design so I bought it not knowing if I'd like it. I've been sitting on it for 8+ hours a day now for 3 days and I am in love with this thing. Thinking of buying several and placing them all over my house-haha! Cool looking, and very comfortable. A++++++
customer_reviews.author: LulusMom15

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair was very easy to put together and inflate. It is very comfortable to sit on. It's a great height for my desk. I love the red color. I bought a less expensive vivora ball and after trying multiple times to inflate it to full size with no success, I just sent it back. It shouldn't be that difficult. This one took 10 minutes to set up and inflate (using an air mattress pump for most of the air, then finishing off with hand pump to adjust comfort). It's worth noting that the hand pump that came with this is of very high quality! Overall, amazing purchase. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but not the product
customer_reviews.text: Tried ... Not conducive for longer sitting/working hours. The product cannot be adjusted to height and that is a big minus since if your foot is not properly rested on floor its not a good sitting posture. Material was durable but got pretty warm on sitting even for a few minutes. NO wheels is another minus, was aware of this when I bought the product but realized how inconvenient it is only after using. Great idea though, wish it was as good to use as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my back
customer_reviews.text: I sit at my desk seven days a week, often late into the evening. I was suffering from back problems that were no doubt due in part to sitting in a chair all day. This chair really helped relieve the pressure off the bottom of my spine, and it makes you engage your core so that you build strength, as well. I had read great reviews but still wasn't sure it was going to be worth the money. After having this a couple of months, I can say I'm extremely happy with it and wouldn't go back to a regular chair.
customer_reviews.author: LC&AG

customer_reviews.title: hoppity hop for grown-ups
customer_reviews.text: ok--- you can't bounce around the room with it .. BUT,,,, i love it. i had one of the big-ball chairs (plastic and on casters) and that really was an accident waiting to happen (and I fell off more than once-- thankfully not in front of coworkers). this is both stable and more comfortable yet helps me to sit up straight. just GREAT
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for son with ASD/ADHD. With this chair option he can shift his weight around while doing his homework and that stimulation helps him focus. Plus it forces him to sit up instead of slouching or flopping over on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair!!!! I alternate between sitting and standing for working. I love this chair because you aren't just sitting, it's active sitting. Plus, it forces you to use good posture. If you don't want to shorten your life and ruin your health by sitting all day, this is an ideal solution! Easy to put together (I did it myself and didn't have to bug the hubby!) and very light weight. This will also come in handy over the holidays when we need more chairs around the dinner table!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: it only works if you do!
customer_reviews.text: The seat assembles easily with a screw driver, ball pump sufficient. I use this chair daily at work with a standard cubicle desk. I often find myself sitting forward on the ball, so I defeat the purpose for improving my posture. When I'm intentional about posture and tightening my core muscles, it works great. Most importantly, I can stand up and walk after sitting for more than an hour. Before this seat, if my lower back was agitated, traditional office chair would cause my back to lock up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I saw it and tried it at another one of my company’s offices when I was on a business trip. I have a Varidesk sit/stand desk, and this is a great little stool to have on the side. I still have a desk chair, but I like to switch it up. This stool forces you to sit up straighter and use your core while sitting, but it doesn’t look as goofy as sitting on a straight up fitness ball like Dwight Schrute.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Weirman

customer_reviews.title: Bottom can't pry off so we can't pump up ball.
customer_reviews.text: The directions say "to access ball pry cover off with screwdriver". It also says "Gently remove with screwdriver". WE COULD NOT GET THE COVER OFF!!! I actually called the hotline to try to get advice. They could not help. They did say if I break it trying to get the cover off my money will be refunded. I have to send this back. In my opinion this is a very poorly designed chair.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Might improve posture and back pain
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a few weeks there’s a definite improvement in posture and back pain relief. Getting on and off the chair would be tricky for someone who has balance problems. So be cautious as there’s nothing to hold on to. Occasionally it needs to be have air added. Overall, it does a better job than a far more expensive “back support” office chair. And it’s certainly a conversation starter. We like the swivel base, too.
customer_reviews.author: ShopWeez

customer_reviews.title: Good but difficult
customer_reviews.text: I love how it works and have used it for months. However, when it is time to pump up the ball a little, omg it is so difficult to remove the bottom piece. It takes so long, so much strength and I feel like I am going to break it every time. I have had it for about a year. I've had to pump it up once before and need to do it again now but I am dreading trying to get the bottom piece off. I have read all the instructions to see if there is an easier way. There is not. It is a struggle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used an Isokinetic ball chair at my previous place of employment and appreciated that using a ball chair really saved my back and allowed me to move (which actually really helps with concentration!). When I switched jobs, I decided to purchase this ball chair based on the reviews. I have only had it a few days, but I absolutely LOVE it! The swivel feature is fantastic and I find that this ball chair is even more comfortable and safe than the isokinetic ball chair. Easy to inflate. Took minutes. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The ball comes to almost like a point at the top and then that's what you sit on-- a pointy hard stub. Hate this thing-we let a bunch of air out of it to make it softer but it makes my butt numb within about 20 minutes and causes the tops of my back thighs to ache. RETURNING THIS
customer_reviews.author: Sam Stone

customer_reviews.title: My back thanks you!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because working from home has been hard on my back. I didn't want to spend thousands on a Herman Miller chair and this seemed like the next best thing. It's PERFECT. No back pain since I've started using it (I am also already under chiropractic care). The color is true to the picture and it adds to my mid century modern theme in the room. My kids also love it and have named it "blobby." So happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Lake

customer_reviews.title: Posture perfect! Relieved lower back pain!
customer_reviews.text: I use it as my home office desk chair. I love it! Teams Meetings are tough to not bounce on but it really has made a difference in my posture and relieving my lower back discomfort from sitting in a regular office chair. I do think it requires you to stand up periodically. As a female (average size) I feel as though sitting on it too long causes a very warm seat area!
customer_reviews.author: brenda roberts

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, comfortable, and helpful for back pain. I did not buy rollers for mine, but depending on your work area size, that may not be needed. For me, it would be too dangerous to be rolling around on this anyway. Many of my colleagues were impressed with the comfort when I let them try it out. It's a good conversation piece too, given the design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I almost broke 2 screwdrivers and did effectively cut my hand trying to “gently pry off” the bottom part in order to access the ball to inflate it. Once assembled it does its job, but it has a serious design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: La Garra

customer_reviews.title: Quality alternative desk chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product that was easy to assemble. The cover is quite thick so hopefully it will prevent the butt sweat that goes with sitting on a rubber ball. I like that the ball is smaller than a standard exercise ball so the chair takes up less space. It tucks away nicely under my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lane

customer_reviews.title: Nugget of Gold
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome little nugget chair. Very bouncy and allows for great back flexibility at your desk.
customer_reviews.author: DeDe

customer_reviews.title: My knee pain is gone!
customer_reviews.text: I had terrible knee pain sitting in my old desk chair, mostly because I'm 5'1" and my feet didn't hit the floor. This chair has solved that problem for me. I would get the same result from a plain old yoga ball but my with three small children my workspace, they last a half a day. This chair is unique because it is a yoga ball but INSIDE the fabric so it won't roll away with little people. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Saunch09

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This chair, which is a ball on a platform with a fabric cover, is excellent quality. I am 6'1" and 225 lbs. I inflated the ball such that it is pretty firm, and it is perfect. All components are very high quality. The fabric cover is very thick and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Coppedge

customer_reviews.title: Not for use for longer than about 1 hour
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this "chair." It went well with the style of my house, it was high enough (I'm using it at my kitchen table which is higher than the average desk), and I thought it would be great for my posture. Alas.... it's just too uncomfortable to sit on for more than an hour or so before you have to get up and move around again. I am on multi-hour long calls sometimes and can't really just take a 20 minute break each hour. I'm very sad to let it go, it's such a pop of color and fun in the house, but it must be returned.
customer_reviews.author: sariahjane

customer_reviews.title: Back and hip saver
customer_reviews.text: This really helped with my back and hip misalignment it’s so much better than a office chair. Since the stay at home order I am having trouble again as I bought the first one for my office. I’m ordering a second for my home now that we have the stay at home order.
customer_reviews.author: Emart

customer_reviews.title: Great for a kid who can't sit still
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to help the 8 year old be able to do remote learning where he has to sit in his chair and not move for large chunks of time. Went from knocking over chairs because he was leaning or rocking to being able to sit and bounce/wiggle and concentrate! Recommend for remote learners!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, but stains easy.
customer_reviews.text: My oldest son with ASD and ADHD loves this chair. We saw them at the U of M Voyaguer Clinic. My ownly complaints are that it easily stains and there are not any “slip covers” sold for it. However, I’m happy I haven’t had to replace a chair from my very active kiddo! The fabric version is great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Evans

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up!!!!! Clear instructions, solidly made.
customer_reviews.text: This was literally 10 minutes from box to full set up! I LOVE this color, the mesh really seems like it will stand up to lots of use. Perfect height for the desk I ordered through Amazon too. The two didn't even cost me $200 together. I’ll debrief again after a full work day! Cheers all
customer_reviews.author: Bagladyish1970

customer_reviews.title: Great but it deflates  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄
customer_reviews.text: After discovering some back complications, I thought it would be smart to get a chair that would increase core activity instead of slouching in a normal chair. This chair itself has a pretty nice modern look and does its job, but the ball seems to deflate and needs a good pumping every so often
customer_reviews.author: D. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Helps my back
customer_reviews.text: I fall over a lot and the seat part isn’t very soft so my bottom hurts after sitting all day on it, but the lower back aches I was getting from sitting in a normal office chair have gotten significantly better. My one complaint is that it feels like the ball deflates and needs refilling about once a week.
customer_reviews.author: PSB

customer_reviews.title: chair for my office desk at home
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a stability ball until away on a trip - I arrived home to a ball that was popped. I wanted something with a ittle more stability this time and didn't roll around as much. This one is really cute, colorful and comfortable. I have not had any issues with discomfort from sitting in it. It works really well - and I like how it looks!
customer_reviews.author: jbro

customer_reviews.title: Ball does not fill material
customer_reviews.text: The chair is not as full as the images online. The ball used inside is small and does not fill the material as the picture shows and the ‘extra material’ bunches up where you sit and is uncomfortable. I deflated the ball and tried to reposition it many times trying to fix the problem. Purchased for home elearning for my 8yr old who has a hard time sitting still. He doesn’t mind but if for myself I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool! Stylish! Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our study. They look awesome! They are fairly comfortable, but you may not want to sit on them all day. Great for a couple of hours, but I wouldn't recommend them for a full work day. But my kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun and Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is all the talk of the office. So fun to have people try it out. Only so much fun you can have under flourescent lighting and this ups the fun factor for sure. The vinyl is nice and soft. You can see the ridges of the ball underneath so it could be improved by sending a smooth ball. The legs are sturdy and easy to attach.
customer_reviews.author: thabomb

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em.
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. I Bought 2 to replace normal high backed office chairs at home. I love sitting on them and they really open the room with their low profile and stash under the desk. There are numerous designs of ball chair but I think these look classy and non gimmicky. I had a bad habit of slouching back in normal chairs and these chairs encourage you to sit correctly and not waste time in front of the computer. Plus they look funky.Love-em.
customer_reviews.author: Johnfking

customer_reviews.title: Rock on a swivel
customer_reviews.text: A rock on a swivel. Like that it swivels but it's not comfortable to sit on. Unless you like to sit on a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret  Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Must have for a classroom!
customer_reviews.text: My students LOVE these. I also love them because you get the same effect as having a ball to sit on but no more balls rolling around the room!!!
customer_reviews.author: Drizzle

customer_reviews.title: 53) The fact that it's really unstable and it doesn't look as nice and clean as the one in the photo (the ...
customer_reviews.text: Based on the price I paid ($141.53) The fact that it's really unstable and it doesn't look as nice and sharp as the one in the photo/video (the vinyl is wrinkled even after a fill the ball up) I hate it! NOT WORTH THE PRICE IT COST.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair for child who fidgets
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this chair. Bought for child with adhd and it is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Allen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money over the ball
customer_reviews.text: Sent bk ball and got this. Waaay better then the ball itself. Much sturdier and can feel in core and helps posture. Love the swivel for sure! Fits perfect under my desk unlike ball wasn’t as hard for support and tall...
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Air Leaks Out
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately, from the first day we got this, the air ball inside leaked... we kept pumping it up with the included hand-pump, but now it is just sitting deflated in our house. Buimmer, it is a nice product otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: Missing the plug for the inner tube very cheap i want a refund horrible
customer_reviews.author: sruch

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for people who are focusing on their core ...
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs for people who are focusing on their core while sitting either for low back pain or because they want to. Easier and look better than just using an exercise ball alone. You get the fabric, a smaller exercise ball you insert and then blow up. You can adjust for comfort. Easy to fit under desk when not in use and doesn't roll away. Also look like pac-man ghosts so that is kind of fun. More modern look for sure in general with certain colors. Have no issues so far with construction.
customer_reviews.author: hanovaman

customer_reviews.title: Its great, one minor product enhancement
customer_reviews.text: Got it, it actually works. I did feel, after sitting on it for about 6 hours, that I was using my core muscles. They were actually a bit sore, guess I'm really out of shape! Minor complaint, it should have some kind of handle. As you are working, it does move around a bit and the only way to move it, is to barrel hug it. Other than that - great.
customer_reviews.author: SandyRed

customer_reviews.title: For ADHD classroom use
customer_reviews.text: Our child uses this as his classroom chair at school. He is ADHD and it REALLY helps by allowing him to wiggle but stay seated while in class.
customer_reviews.author: C.Yama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ADHD Teen
customer_reviews.text: We got this chair for our ADHD teenager to use while he does his online virtual schooling. He can bounce/spin all he wants.... and even stands on it. He loves it and it keeps him engaged in several hours of school. A lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I realized it was an extremely comfortable option for my mandolin practice
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday, with the intention of bringing it to my office. However, once I set it up at home, I realized it was an extremely comfortable option for my mandolin practice. I guess I have to buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy T

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my Zenergy Ball. I have been using it daily for months at work and it has done wonder for my posture, completely eliminating the shoulder pain I used to always have. I am 5'4 and the height is perfect for me. I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I was sitting on a balloon chair but that was uncomfortable because it was too wide. This works really nice.
customer_reviews.author: josephine

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and practical
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. We bought 2 of them for a workstation upstairs where the kids do their homework. We were looking for something that looked better than a normal chair but also promote good posture and was fun. We've had them for over 2 years and I'm happy to report that these have exceeded our expectations. They have held up to daily use by 4 kids and continue to look great.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Kids and adults love these chairs!! They are super popular in our Children's Wing. The kids love the fun colors, and the adults love the comfort of sitting on these chairs. Assembly was fairly easy, and the chairs have been out for over 6 months now so they are holding up to the usage from the families.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Chair...
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. Good quality. It definitely strengthens your core and matins your posture. It does seem to get hot sitting on it in my shorts. Maybe a good thing as it makes me limit my time sitting in front of the computer.. probably the best benefit of all....
customer_reviews.author: Echoman007

customer_reviews.title: Fun and functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my classroom circle/meeting chair. My kids use it as much as me and everyone that comes into my room tries it out. It’s fun, functional and great for balance stability and core
customer_reviews.author: rainbobarb

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this chair. My back and hips feel sooo much better. Very durable and forces good posture. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia r. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for kids. Bought these for a student station in a 4th grade classroom. The kids love it when its their turn at this station. Helps them sit up straight and they also have a little bounce to them which they state helps them THINK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Norma T. Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase: packaged to protect the Zenergy Ball Chair
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase: packaged to protect the Zenergy Ball Chair, arrived as promised. The air pump was easy to use as were the directions to put legs on the frame. No problems at all. Many thanks, Phil
customer_reviews.author: PFC

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Looks crappy and not even remotely comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this and will be returning it. Looks absolutely nothing like the pictures. The ball is tiny and doesn't come close to filling up the "pouch" it's supposed to go in. Looks crappy, feels uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to avoid my normal office chair but I can only make it about 2 hours before my bottom is extremely sore. I'm 5'7 175lbs. Will keep this for a guest chair and/or short term use but definitely nothing you'd want to sit in long term.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome
customer_reviews.text: This chair changed me. I tried liking balls but they were too wobbly. This is a perfect combination of a ball and stool. I immediately started using it 8-10 hrs a day and find myself much more energized at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H

customer_reviews.title: Not good for work
customer_reviews.text: Hurts your butt and too short. Didn’t have enough time to return.. just get a regular chair.
customer_reviews.author: phylisha

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really good chair, however needs padding on the legs, otherwise they will scratch wood floor. Otherwise, really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: looks nice and works
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, nice looking for what it is. If I sit for long periods I switch up between a chair and this and its working great!
customer_reviews.author: D. Guarnero

customer_reviews.title: This seat was a great discovery for me
customer_reviews.text: This seat was a great discovery for me. I disliked the chairs around the office and saw one of my co-workers with one of these for some lumbar issues. After trying his, I decided to get one. When sat-on properly, it promotes core strength and, to my surprise, "bathroom functioning" ha ha.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Ripping at the seams.
customer_reviews.text: 1/31/20 update to previous compliant - this is the 2nd (of the ball chairs 4 ordered in December) found to be ripping at the seams. We ordered 4 of these for our classroom and several earlier in the school year for our library. The chairs seem to work well with students and staff. So this one was probably just a unfortunate fluke. Just make sure to check the seams before your return window expires.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Super easy installation and great for posture and just better than your typical chair. Give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking pressure off of hips. Could be a bit higher.
customer_reviews.text: I use it at work when my hips are tight. It is lower than a typical desk chair which is a bit of a bummer. If it was 4 inches taller everyone would have one.
customer_reviews.author: steve from chicago

customer_reviews.title: stability ball
customer_reviews.text: We use this at our desks at work - a staff of 9 shares it it has helped with our posture, one person reported reduced back discomfort - my lower back pain went away - we also use it for stretching and ab work outs while at our desks.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my office. It is perfect! It was easy to put together and the ball inside is sturdy. Helps tremendously with my back after having to sit at the computer all day.
customer_reviews.author: Teach4Peace

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability of parts.
customer_reviews.text: The pump provided with this item does not actually fit with the ball. Unable to inflate the ball with the pump provided. Thus far it is unusable. The plug to the hole also doesn't actually fit.
customer_reviews.author: dr. Kojima

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Had a little trouble removing the bottom to be able to inflate the ball, but once the bottom was off, the set up was easy. Very comfortable seat - and I love the swivel!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Base is VERY difficult to pry off!
customer_reviews.text: A screwdriver isn't going to do it but a pry bar will!! Once the base was pried off it was very easy to assemble and the chair itself is GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: These look better in person
customer_reviews.text: These look better in person! I saw them in use a couple of places before ordering my own, I was worried from the pictures it would't look as nice as the ones I've seen in person, luckily it does look great. I like this chair. And it does encourage me to correct my posture and bounce to loosen up every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: I really like this cute chair
customer_reviews.text: I can sit for a long time without any back pain
customer_reviews.author: A. Crickmer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and perfect for petite people!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest chair ever. Perfect for petite people- a chair that actually fits and it so comfortable and fun. I splurged a little bit on this and I am so glad I did. Very unique. I live it in red. The color just pops!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Well made, super cool chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks super cool, is well made, and very comfortable. I put felt pads on the bottoms of the feet and it slides easily on hard wood floors but does not slide while I sit on it (unless I want it to). I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bounce, bounce, bounce
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, this is a really comfortable sitting apparatus. I don't think it really falls into the traditional "chair" definition. Nor is it a stool. What it is though, is a ball, inflated and covered with fabric. It's great. I have six pack abs (covered by a thin beer-coozy layer of fat) because of this chair. Just don't fall asleep while you're on it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: A Fine Product that Works Well - Easy to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, very comfortable and relieves stress on back and legs because you are sitting a different way. You don't need to lean back and are using your core muscles to sit up. Over all you just feel better and can bounce up and down when someone frustrates you by sending a stupid email which is about 50 times a day. Very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Exercise ball will not stay full!
customer_reviews.text: Every since the day I put together my chair, I have had to pump up the ball in the chair every single day. If the ball were to stay full- I would love the chair! I have looked for a hole in the ball-but there isn't any. The ball is a defect and wont stay full because of the seal. Air leaks out of seal.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are great for a desk or for the office
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great for a desk or for the office. I use them in my classroom and they have stood up to the ultimate test, 22 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work because I have back issues, in fact I just had surgery. This chair is SO helpful and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Londen Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I got the black leather and it came out way better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Sam R.

customer_reviews.title: My Students LOVE this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but my students LOVE this chair! I wish I could afford more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair, great for the back and strengthening your core.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this ball chair
customer_reviews.text: I like this ball chair, it doesn't move around like the others. I still have back pain after rising, but that's due to my back problems. Would rather sit on this than a regular chair.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiigirl

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to assemble and was what I expected it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to assemble and was what I expected it to be. Comfortable if you are seeking to reduce slouching and improve core strength. I use it as my main desk chair at work.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my office, and no more owed back pain . Happy costumer
customer_reviews.author: Pwnland

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great chair for someone who’s restless like me and can’t sit still. It also forces me to sit up straight and work on my posture.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver clark

customer_reviews.title: This is GREAT! I am using it at my desk at ...
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT! I am using it at my desk at work...keeping me always moving yet centered. Not tipping! Swivel is great feature. Going to get another for home, and another as a gift for each of the kids to use while doing homework.
customer_reviews.author: Always Learning

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Love my chair. Helps me remember to sit straighter and can move around. Doesn't feel like I'm glued to a chair all day in front of my computer.
customer_reviews.author: joann

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. It is the only one I found that’s stylish and helps with lower back support.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Easy to assemble. I like this style better than those other ball chairs where the ball is exposed. This is much more stylish. Fits perfectly to the height of my desk at work like my normal work chair. I love it! My co-workers have also decided to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and I like that it doesn't roll around like my exercise ball. I bought it because I get a backache if I sit on the sofa...this is a great alternative for watching television in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: MN reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to get set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to get set up. Comes with everything you need. My wife likes it at her work because it is comfortable and helps her posture.
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable assembly
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to put together, even if you're not terribly handy. Fun shape, fun to sit on, love that it swivels smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Flubber

customer_reviews.title: great chair
customer_reviews.text: Sitting on it right now typing this review, have had it for awhile, really like it. I bounce on it often just to keep moving while at the computer
customer_reviews.author: Jane Perillo

customer_reviews.title: Fabric
customer_reviews.text: The chair itself is great - the fabric is horrific . Had this for 3 weeks and it has completely pilled . Looks terrible .
customer_reviews.author: L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Need a new ball inside.
customer_reviews.text: The ball inside of of the 6 of these we have ordered will not hold air and we don't know how to repair. This was purchased on 8/5/16. I would like to have a replacement or repair please.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one is my favorite. I’ve had the kneeling type of chair and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive owned 3 ergonomic chairs. This one is my favorite. I’ve had the kneeling type of chair and it’s not as nearly as good as these ball types. This one is more sturdy than the other ball chair with the wheels and back rest. Get this one.
customer_reviews.author: robert j bravo

customer_reviews.title: and is kind of a fun chair, but sitting for longer than 30 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: This ball chair definitely helps with posture, and is kind of a fun chair, but sitting for longer than 30 minutes in this chair gives me a fair amount of low back pain and stiffness. If you are looking for a chair that is good for a bad back, get something with a good lumbar support.
customer_reviews.author: Reese Farrow

customer_reviews.title: helps your posturr
customer_reviews.text: This may look like a green alien about to move across the floor, but it's very comfortable. If you sit on this for any length of time, you might want to not inflate it too much.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G

product_meta.title: Safco Products Zenergy Ball Chair, Black, Low Profile, Active Seating
product_meta.description: Color:Black Mesh| Style:LegsSafco Zenergy Ball Chair helps encourage good posture and core muscle strength to help combat the negative effects of inactivity in the office. Based around an inflatable, anti-burst exercise ball, Zenergy offers the posture benefits of a yoga ball without all the inconvenient rolling around. During assembly, you can choose to install both the feet and legs on Zenergy for a seat height of 23", or just the feet for a lower seat height of 20". Weighing in at only 15 lbs., the Zenergy ball chair is easy to move from place to place and fits neatly under most work surfaces when not in use. Part of the Safco Active Collection. Safco Active products are designed to promote active movement throughout the day and engage major muscle groups to help combat the negative effects of inactivity in the office.
feature_bullets: HELPS KEEP YOUR BODY MOVING. Safco Zenergy Ball Chair provides an active seating experience that helps encourage good posture, core muscle strength and may help increase concentration.

ENCOURAGES BETTER POSTURE. Designed with an anti-burst exercise ball and four legs for stability and durability, Zenergy offers the posture benefits of a yoga ball without the rolling. These benefits may include better balance and concentration.

CHOOSE YOUR ALTITUDE. Each Zenergy ball chair lets you select one of two heights by installing just the feet for a sitting height of 20" or both the legs and the feet for a sitting height of 23" – both options are included.

GREENGUARD Certified products are scientifically proven to meet some of the world’s most rigorous, third-party chemical emissions standards, helping reduce indoor air pollution and the risk of chemical exposure to help create healthier indoor environments

DIMENSIONS. Overall (Leg Option): 23"H x 22-1/2"D x 22-1/2"W. Overall (Feet Only Option): 20"H x 17-1/2"D x 17-1/2"W. Product Weight: 15 lbs. Maximum User Weight Capacity: 250 lbs. Manual pump included.
